page.title: 13Interviewing a Landlady.
page.content: 1.Were you born in Aberystwyth?{No. 2.Why did you pick this spot?{Because {it is in a good position in the town. 3.Why did you want to become a Landlady?{Because I had the chance to {be one.}4.How many rooms do you have?{ {Ten letting rooms.}5.Approx.how many people stay in the Summer?{On average {18 people stay for one night.}6.Do people tidy up after their stay?{ {Generally yes.}7.Do you have cleaners working for you?{Yes.}8.About how much do landladies charge in Aberystwyth? { {Â£8.00 a night.}9.Do you ever leave your house with somebody else in charge?{Yes.}10.What do you do in your spare time?{I read,watch T.V. and {walk. { }
